CustomField.description: Use this field to manually populate the name of the field set used to display a summary of information about this product in the Online Application topbar. This field set must be created during implementation time. This replaces the default field set with a field set specifically for that product's online application.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the name of the existing field set that should be used to render a summary of this product in the Online Applications topbar. If one is not entered, the default field set will be used.
CustomField.label: Online Application Topbar Fieldset
